div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1693 Suez Canal, 1860 (1014) Burial: c. 220 B.C.? (Jenkins) Contents: 1 AV, 2 AR. Hoard? Berenice II: 1 AV dodecadr. 2 AR pentadr. Disposition: Dupré 2, (cf. Dupré sale, Hoff- mann April 24, 1867, nos. 351, 353); Gréau 1 (?) Huber, WNM 1868, pp. 233, 242 Newell, NNM 33 (1927), p. 9
